entry.title: Friday: Flurries. High plus 4.

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries before morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries beginning in the morning and ending in the afternoon. Risk of freezing rain late in the morning. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High plus 2. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Friday 17 March 2023
